response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is indeed worth $15,000 to you. Considering the high demand and limited availability, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at an exclusive price of $14,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you secure the product without exceeding your budget while allowing me to maximize the value of my offering. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this transaction. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
